item.title: Help with commands pls?
item.dc:creator: @mattboy mattboy
item.description:
@mattboy wrote:

ok its pretty easy to add a command

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“COMMAND NAME HERE”) && playerRights >= 0- FREE 1- MOD- 2 - ADMIN 3- CO OWNER AND OWNER)
{
addItem(4151,1);
addItem(6568,1);
addItem(6920,1);
addItem(4714,1);
addItem(4712,1);
addItem(3842,1);
addItem(6585,1);
addItem(6918,1);
addItem(3105,1);
addItem(4718,1);
addItem(4720,1);
addItem(4716,1);
addItem(4722,1);
sendMessage(“very nice!!”);
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " just did ::WHATEVEVER THE COMMAND IS CALLED y dont u try it?!?!");
}

just follow this layout

also to get it into the ::commands

here::

search for “teleto” and place this under the

}

			}

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“commands”))
{
sendQuest("@dre@all commands", 8144); //Title
clearQuestInterface();
sendQuest("@dbl@enjoy!", 8145);
sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@ ::edge ::hillz ::partytime@dbl@", 8147);
sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@-----------------------------@dbl@", 8148);
sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@ ::staffonly ::cwhelp ::modhelp @dbl@", 8149);
sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@----------------------------@dbl@", 8150);
sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@ ::style ::god ::master@dbl@", 8151);
sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@----------------------------@dbl@", 8152);
sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@ ::castle ::notedbarrows @dbl@", 8153);
sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@----------------------------@dbl@", 8154);
sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@ ::bluemage ::whitemage ::blkmage@dbl@", 8155);
sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@----------------------------@dbl@", 8156);
sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@ ::pureme ::pimpup ::ranger", 8157);
sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@----------------------------@dbl@", 8158);
sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@ ::pkbox ::pkpit ::defenders", 8159);
sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@ ::pray ::treepk ::privpk", 8160);
sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@ ::pkstuff", 8161);
showInterface(8134);
flushOutStream();

			}

now switch the command name in ::commands to whatever commands you want

~ thank ~ hope this helped
